Text: This installs unwanted toolbars (for face book) to Firefox. There is no option not to install the toolbars. And that is wrong, it is bad enough that stuff come with bundled fuck you software but to install uninvited if obscene.

I have a working mkv file and when I "Open Video" I am informed that I do not have the required decoder.

The software is fucked, don't bother downloading it cause it does not fucking work, arsehole uploader.
Shitware...  NOT as pictured as above.
